div.p: For the latest district updates and information regarding COVID-19, please visit www.tcaps.net/covid-19.

Per Executive Order 2020-35, all K-12 schools in Michigan are closed to in-person instruction for the remainder of the school year. View the TCAPS Continuity of Education Plan to learn more about the district's ongoing remote learning plan.

div.p: Please enjoy this month’s edition of Our Community newsletter which includes an excellent video highlighting our incredible student musicians and teachers whose expertise in music instruction is regularly recognized at the state level.

Read this month’s edition of Our Community, TCAPS’ district newsletter, for student, staff, and district achievements, upcoming events, and to watch an excellent video featuring the SCI-MA-TECH program.

View the December 2019 edition of Our Community, TCAPS’ district newsletter. This month’s edition features an exciting video of students participating in Hour of Code and provides information on upcoming events, student achievement, and the many ways our staff, students and Partners In Education are giving back during the holiday season.

Board Meeting - Virtual Meeting (see event details)
Calendar: Board Calendar
TCAPS Virtual Meeting Notice for April, 13, 2020 at 6:00 pm
REASON: COVID-19 Community Gathering Restrictions
This meeting will be conducted remotely as identified below and will not be held at the Tompkins Boardman Administration Building.
Instructions regarding viewing and participating (finer details below):
Meeting will be broadcast live on Cable Channel 190
Meeting will be live streamed at: https://livestream.com/tcapslive/board
For individuals who wish to give public comment, please complete the Public Comment Request form prior to the meeting. This form can also be found on the Boardâ€™s page of the district website at www.tcaps.net/board/. Prior to the meeting you will receive an email confirmation with a phone number and PIN to access the Google Hangout. If you do not receive this email, please contact the moderator at 231-933-3308. You will need to call in and wait in a "virtual waiting room" where microphones will be muted by a moderator. When it is your turn to speak, you will be identified by the last two (2) digits of your phone number and you will need to push *6 to unmute your microphone.
Please see the following message regarding theBoard of Education meeting scheduled for April 13, 2020, which will beconducted remotely:
Traverse City Area Public Schools recognizes the importance of notbringing people together unnecessarily in an effort to stop the spread of theCOVID-19. Therefore, the Tompkins Boardman Administration Building hasbeen closed for the foreseeable future. TCAPS Board Members will not be present for the regularly scheduledboard meetings until further notice. TCAPS Board members can be emailed directly at the email addresseslisted below:
Board President, Sue Kelly â€“ kellysu2@tcaps.net
Board Trustee, Jane Klegman â€“ kelgmanja@tcaps.net
Board Vice President, Jeff Leonhardt â€“ leonhardje@tcaps.net
BoardTrustee, Ben McGuire â€“ mcguirebe@tcaps.net
Board Secretary, Pam Forton â€“ fortonpa@tcaps.net
Board Trustee, Erica Moon Mohr â€“ mohrer@tcaps.net
Board Treasurer, Matt Anderson â€“ andersonma@tcaps.net
Board meetings will continue to be broadcast live on Cable Channel190 and will be streamed live at: https://livestream.com/tcapslive/board.
For individuals who wish to give public comment, please complete thePublicComment Request form prior to the meeting. This form can also be found on the Boardâ€™s page of the district website. Prior to the meeting you will receive anemail confirmation with a phone number and PIN to access the GoogleHangout. If you do not receive thisemail, please contact the moderator at 231-933-3308. You will need to call in and wait in a"virtual waiting room" where microphones will be muted by amoderator. When it is your turn tospeak, you will be identified by the last two (2) digits of your phone numberand you will need to push *6 to unmuteyour microphone.
During the public comment portion of the agenda, callers will beidentified in the order the Public Comment Requests were received. The moderator will identify the caller by thelast two (2) digits of their telephone number and ask them if they would liketo make a comment. Please identify yourself by full name andaddress when you are called on. An individual may make public comment for up tothree (3) minutes. The Board will notrespond to public comment. We ask thatconcerns or comments directed toward individuals be made privately or inwriting to the Superintendent, designee, or Board of Education President.
Any person with a disability or who needs accommodation forparticipation in this meeting should contact Stacey Hozak, Board RecordingSecretary at (231) 933-1725 (or hozakst@tcaps.net) in advance of themeeting to request assistance.
The agenda and packet of informational items will be made availableto the public on the Boardâ€™s page of the district website prior to the BoardMeeting.

div.h2: Accessibility Assistance Request / Asistencia Disponible para Padres de Habla Hispana

div.p: Can't find what you are looking for? View the site map

If you experience difficulty with the accessibility of any web pages or documents on the TCAPS district and/or school webpages, please email info@tcaps.net or call 231.933.1794 and we will be happy to assist you.

img.a: Asistencia Disponible para Padres de Habla Hispana
